table.caption: Suggested Bonds
rows: My captain is dearer to me than any other person or possession.
My greatest dream is to return across the sea to the land my ancestors left.
I abandoned a child to be fostered in a city somewhere.
I was shipwrecked on an island with a vampire, and we became good friends.
I buried a great treasure somewhere... and lost the map.
I have one piece of a treasure map, and no idea where the other pieces are.
table.name: Brazen Coalition; Suggested Bonds
